description: We went through the many new LEGO sets out in June 2025 and hand-picked the best of the bunch. And buddy, between Harry Potter, Star Wars, Minecraft, and more, there are a lot.

description: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach's ESRB rating suggests players will be able to use Higgs' weapon from the announcement trailer themselves. Spoilers follow!

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Downton Abbey is finally coming to a close with Downton Abbey: The Grand Finale. The trailer for the upcoming film, which is set to put the story’s 15-year run to bed once and for all, was just released by Focus Features.
title: It's Finally Coming to an End — Downton Abbey: The Grand Finale Just Got a Trailer

author: Tom Phillips

description: One of the least expensive RTX 5080 prebuilts you can get right now.

description: The Last of Us season two is getting a 4K steelbook that's now available to preorder. It's set to release on September 23.

author: Vikki Blake
description: Hi-Fi Rush developer Tango Gameworks has unveiled its new-look website and confirmed its working on an "unannounced action game."
title: Hi-Fi Rush Dev Tango Gameworks 'Remains Dedicated to Distinctive and New IPs,' as It Starts Hiring for New Action Game

author: Eric Van Allen
description: Elden Ring Nightreign Patch 1.01.1 is live now, taking aim at the single-player experience to hopefully ease up the difficulty on those trying to clear the new FromSoftware game by themselves. One player, however, decided not to wait, and cleared every Nightlord solo before the patch made anything easier.
title: One Elden Right Nightreign Player Got Their Solo Nightlord Clears In Before the Nerf — Here's How

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Here we go again! The upcoming sequel to the Five Nights at Freddy’s film adaptation, simply titled Five Nights at Freddy’s 2, has officially released its poster — and needless to say, we’re pretty excited to head back to Freddy Fazbear’s for a slice (pun intended) once again.
title: Five Nights at Freddy's 2 Poster Revealed — and Someone's Trying to Lure Us Back to Fazbear's

author: Tom Phillips
description: The Witcher 4 developer CD Projekt Red has confirmed it will showcase more of its highly-anticipated upcoming RPG this week.
title: The Witcher 4's Unreal Engine 5 In-Game Features and Technology Set to Be Revealed Tomorrow

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Finally, more five years after its first announcement, we're about to get our first real look at IO Interactive's new James Bond game. Initially teased as Project 007, the official title is 007 First Light, and it's set for a reveal sometime this week.
title: James Bond Game From Hitman Dev Has a New Title, 007 First Light, Official Reveal This Week

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Introducing Victory Banner, a new World War II-set real-time strategy and third-person shooter hybrid whose gameplay that lets you switch seamlessly between top-down tactics and boots-on-the-ground action. You'll secure trenches, rescue wounded allies, set up comms, and more. You'll be able to play as sniper, medic, or tank operator – and every soldier has a name and a story, a la XCOM, in an effort to give extra gameplay meaning to each unit.
title: Victory Banner, a WWII RTS/Third-Person Shooter Hybrid, Announced for PC

author: Ben Williams
description: Here is whether Nintendo Switch 2 preorders at Amazon UK will arrive on release day, following reports of delays to June 7th.
title: Amazon Switch 2 Preorders: Will It Arrive for Release Day in the UK?

author: Tom Phillips
description: Ncuti Gatwa's decision to leave Doctor Who after only two seasons prompted extensive reshoots early this year, fans believe.
title: Doctor Who: Ncuti Gatwa's Sudden Regeneration Required Extensive Reshoots, Fans Believe

author: Vikki Blake
description: Reports that modders unlocked a secret multiplayer mode in Stellar Blade aren't quite as they seem, claims the player who first posted a split-screen gameplay video that's going viral across social media.
title: There's No Stellar Blade Multiplayer Mod, but There Are Signs of Multiplayer in the Game Files

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: FromSoftware has released Elden Ring Nightreign update 1.01.1, the game’s first since launch, and with it made single-player mode a lot easier. Check out the patch notes.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Patch 1.01.1 Nerfs Solo Mode Difficulty, Fixes Bugs, and Makes More Balance Changes

author: Tom Phillips
description: Ubisoft's unannounced but widely-expected Assassin's Creed: Black Flag remake has been referenced again, this time by a collectible statue maker.
title: Assassin's Creed: Black Flag Remake Rumors Swirl as Collectible Maker Admits 'There Is Something Going On'

author: Matt Purslow
description: Cyberpunk 2077 is a launch game for Switch 2 - here's how developer CD Projekt Red got the ambitious open world running on Nintendo's new hardware.
title: How CD Projekt Red Got Cyberpunk 2077 Running on Switch 2

author: Vikki Blake
description: The co-founder of The Witcher 3 developer CD Projekt Red, Marcin Iwiński, has said the studio has learned to stick to its "niche." That is: "AAA RPG, open-world narrative-driven games."
title: The Witcher Developer CD Projekt Plans to Stick to its 'Niche' — And That's AAA RPG Open-world Narrative-Driven Games

author: Christian Wait
description: Destined Rivals is a must-buy Pokémon TCG set with banger chase cards like Team Rocket's Mewtwo ex SIR and Ethan's Ho-Oh ex. Check out the best singles to buy now and secure sealed boosters.
title: Pokémon TCG Destined Rivals: Best Singles to Chase and Buy This Week

author: Tom Phillips
description: Ahead of Switch 2's launch this week, Nintendo has confirmed that owners of the new console should not remove the protective film covering its screen.
title: Nintendo Warns Switch 2 Owners Not to Peel Off the Screen's Protective Film

description: Beloved YouTuber Shirley Curry, colloquially known as the Skyrim Grandma, has started playing The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered — and chat is giving her all the help she needs.
title: Skyrim Grandma Is Playing The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered — and Chat Is Helping Out

author: Tom Phillips
description: Doctor Who star Ncuti Gatwa has quit the show and passed his Time Lord baton to Billie Piper — but fans believe all is not what it seems.
title: Doctor Who Star Regenerates Into Billie Piper, But Fans Think She's Not Actually Playing The Doctor

author: Vikki Blake
description: People Can Fly, the Polish studio best-known for Outriders and Gears of War Judgment, has confirmed even more jobs are at risk as it cancels two projects: Project Gemini and Project Bifrost. Project Gemini was a game set to be published by Square Enix.
title: Outriders Developer People Can Fly Blames 'Lack of Communication' With Publisher Square Enix for Game Cancellation

author: Adam Mathew
description: The first gaming discounts of June have landed with all the subtlety of a final lap blue shell.
title: AU Deals: New Lowest Evers on Metaphor, Elden Rings, Tekken 8, Monster Hunter Wilds, and More!
